title: Merch Shop?
body: Hey hey! Just wondering whats going on with the merch shop? I wanted to buy a Pentakill tee last night but the shop was down. I'm checking back now, a full day later, and it's still down? Anybody know whats going on and/or do any reds have anything to say on it? Mucho appreciant√© fam!

replies.body: There were some things the merch devs were working out on the backend in order to fix certain issues, but right now I haven't heard any sort of timeline. I'll be reaching out periodically for any kind of updates, and will be sure to post some sort of sticky once I know something for sure!
